name: AstroMatch!
description:
AstroMatch!

AstroMatch takes your standard match three formula and introduces a fun competitive twist! 

A competitive match three game!

Each players starts off with a timer that decrements over time. Every match you make, you add to your timer, and subtracts from your opponents timer. 

And everything speeds up!

That's not all! The game gets more hectic as it goes on. At first, matching doesn't detract from your opponents' time, a chance to rack up extra time. When you make a match, there's a split second before the match registers and the pieces disappears. This buffer shrinks as the game goes on, the AI makes faster moves and matching detracts more time from your opponents as the game goes on.
